testcase.name: Verify Update Teacher functionality
testcase.system-out: When User click on threedots button on Christian teacher....................passed And User click on Edit button...............................................passed And User edit "Macarena" in first name......................................passed And User edit "John" in last name...........................................passed And User edit "mcjo@xxx.com" in email.......................................passed And User edit "01/01/2020" in joining date calendar.........................passed And User edit "22" in password..............................................passed And User edit "HR" in subject...............................................passed And User edit "0987654321" in mobile number.................................passed And User edit "Female" in gender............................................passed And User edit "Science" in department dropdown..............................passed And User edit "01/01/2001" in birth date calendar...........................passed And User edit "125000" in salary............................................passed And User edit "2" in batch..................................................passed And User edit "Auto" in section.............................................passed And User edit "2ndAvenue" in present adress.................................passed And User click Submit button................................................passed Then User should see the edited profile displayed in the UI.................passed And Tester should be able to veryfy the edited Teacher in DataBase..........passed
